title: Best early Black Friday Target deals 2025: 15+ early tech deals live now

content.raw: The holiday season is upon us, which means that Black Friday deals are on the horizon. Here are the best Cyber Week discounts at Target right now.

content.full:
'ZDNET Recommends': What exactly does it mean?
ZDNET's recommendations are based on many hours of testing, research, and comparison shopping. We gather data from the best available sources, including vendor and retailer listings as well as other relevant and independent reviews sites. And we pore over customer reviews to find out what matters to real people who already own and use the products and services weâ€™re assessing.
When you click through from our site to a retailer and buy a product or service, we may earn affiliate commissions. This helps support our work, but does not affect what we cover or how, and it does not affect the price you pay. Neither ZDNET nor the author are compensated for these independent reviews. Indeed, we follow strict guidelines that ensure our editorial content is never influenced by advertisers.
ZDNET's editorial team writes on behalf of you, our reader. Our goal is to deliver the most accurate information and the most knowledgeable advice possible in order to help you make smarter buying decisions on tech gear and a wide array of products and services. Our editors thoroughly review and fact-check every article to ensure that our content meets the highest standards. If we have made an error or published misleading information, we will correct or clarify the article. If you see inaccuracies in our content, please report the mistake via this form.
Best early Black Friday Target deals 2025: I found the best discounts live now
Target offers some of the best deals of the year during Black Friday, and you can already shop for great discounts on tech. Aside from the big event after the day after Thanksgiving, the retailer is hosting a three-day early Black Friday sale from Nov. 6-8, where most deals start at least 40% off. Even today, however, you can already find some huge discounts on great tech.
Also: The best Black Friday deals live now
The best early Black Friday Target deals are cropping up from now until the end of November, so I'll be keeping a close eye on them to bring you the most up-to-date pricing information.
Best early Black Friday Target deals
- Current price: $20 (43% off)
- Original price: $35
The Amazon Fire TV Stick HD, at only $20, is a great way to upgrade your existing HD TV and give it smart capabilities. You can even use it on an older smart TV that may have slowed down over time, and breathe new life into it.

These awesome gadgets make anything from setting up furniture to replacing a doorknob a breeze, so you never dread tackling the next item on your to-do list.

If you need a laptop for everyday use, schoolwork, or work, the HP Chromebook 14-inch HD laptop is available for just $190. This Chromebook features an Intel Celeron N4500 processor, 4GB of RAM, and 64GB of internal storage.

The Samsung S3 IPS monitor is a 27-inch display that supports a refresh rate of up to 100Hz. This is a good option for a home office, especially with its $110 price. Its adjustable tilt base lets you set it up to your comfort.

This Bose TV soundbar uses Bluetooth for wireless connectivity to your TV, though you can also use the included optical audio cable to connect it directly. The compact soundbar is only a bit over two inches tall, but it delivers an elevated sound experience to your TV's audio alone, with Dialogue Mode to enhance speech clarity.
Also: This space-saving soundbar delivers clarity and power in every note (and it's $100 off)
More early Black Friday Target deals

FAQs
When is Black Friday?
Black Friday 2025 is on Friday, Nov. 28, and Cyber Monday will be on Monday, Dec. 1. Black Friday is always the day after Thanksgiving in the US, a holiday that is celebrated on the last Thursday in November. Many employers have historically given workers the Friday after Thanksgiving as a day off, so retailers started featuring discounts to encourage people to do their holiday shopping.
Are Target deals really cheaper during Black Friday?
Target offers the best discounts of the year during Black Friday, with most of them starting at 40% off. Most major retailers in the US offer significant discounts during Black Friday to compete with one another, and Target is no exception. Many of Target's best deals will start at 60% off, so many products will reach their lowest price ever during Black Friday; it's just a matter of catching them before they're sold out.
How did we choose these early Black Friday deals?
As a full-time tech writer and reviewer, I'm constantly monitoring prices on devices as part of my work, so
I'm always looking for the best combinations of worthwhile features and great value. I review gadgets, tablets, smart home technology, and robot vacuums for ZDNET, so I've become well-acquainted with price fluctuations.
At ZDNET, we use our expertise and deal-tracking tools to identify the offers that are truly worth your attention -- and only highlight those.
